summary: A prostitute is killed during a bachelor party and the attendees turn on each other as the wedding approaches.
cast: Jon Favreau|Leland Orser|Cameron Diaz|Christian Slater|Rob Brownstein|Jeremy Piven|Daniel Stern|Jeanne Tripplehorn|Joey Zimmerman|Tyler Cole Malinger|Kobe Tai|Russell B. McKenzie|Pancho Demmings|Blake Gibbons|Angelo Di Mascio Jr.|Lawrence Pressman|Steve Fitchpatrick|Brian Grandison|John Cappon|Linda Klein|Byrne Piven|Bob Bancroft|Trey Davis|Marilyn McIntyre|Wrangler|Trooper|Peter Berg|Brian Sampson
title: Very Bad Things
